== dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

[,yaml]
----
version: '1.1'
var1: yes    # a first variable
var2:
  description: a second variable
  type: boolean
  default:
    jinja: |
      {% if rougail.var1 == 'no' %}
      false
      {% endif %}
    description: return false if the value of var1 is "no"
----
